descriptionText:
Containers must not be allowed to run with root privileges.
The following fields must be set to `false`: `privileged`, `allowPrivilegeEscalation`, and `readOnlyRootFilesystem`.
The `runAsUser.rule` field must be set to `MustRunAsNonRoot`.
The `fsGroup` and `supplementalGroups` settings must use `MustRunAs` and must not allow the root range (GID 0); adding the root group must be forbidden.
